name: raneto
description: Raneto is a self-hosted Markdown-powered knowledge base and documentation system. It supports search, categories, and page editing without a database.
features: Markdown-powered: Write documentation in plain Markdown files for easy editing and version control.
No database required: Store all content as files on disk for simple backups and portability.
Full-text search: Find information quickly across all documentation pages with built-in search.
Category organization: Group related pages into categories for logical navigation structure.
Live editing: Update documentation through the web interface without restarting the server.
Syntax highlighting: Display code examples with proper formatting for multiple programming languages.
Custom themes: Modify the appearance with CSS and templates to match your brand.
Access control: Protect sensitive documentation with password authentication and user management.
Git integration: Track changes to documentation by storing Markdown files in a Git repository.
Table of contents: Automatically generate navigation from your folder structure and file names.
Metadata support: Add titles, descriptions, and sorting information using YAML front matter.
Responsive design: Read documentation comfortably on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
